component.name: Kaidan
component.summary: Kaidan, a simple and user-friendly Jabber/XMPP client for every device and platform

description.p: Kaidan is a simple, user-friendly Jabber/XMPP client providing a modern user-interface using Kirigami and QtQuick. The back-end of Kaidan is entirely written in C++ using the qxmpp XMPP client library and Qt 5.
Kaidan is not finished yet, so donâ€™t expect it working as well as a finished client will do.
For a list of supported XEPs, have a look at the Wiki.
